title: Noam Chomsky webinar at the division of linguistics at Lund University.Sep,29,2022
description: Professor Noam Chomsky webinar on “Language, Mind and Thought” was held at the division of Linguistics at Lund University on September 29, 2022. The webinar was hosted by Mehdi Sabzevari, Arthur Holmer, and Mikael Roll. Professor Noam Chomsky answered the questions we collected from the researchers in advance of the webinar.
